turns.content: 請告訴我15個腹痛的理學檢查項目，請以英文回答，並利用以下範例格式回覆，Rebouding pain(None/Rebounding pain +)

1. Abdominal tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
2. Abdominal distension (None/Distension +)
3. Guarding (None/Guarding +)
4. Rigidity (None/Rigidity +)
5. Palpable masses (None/Mass +)
6. Liver span (Normal/Increased/Decreased)
7. Spleen size (Normal/Enlarged)
8. Bowel sounds (Normal/Absent/Hypoactive/Hyperactive)
9. Percussion tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
10. Murphy's sign (Negative/Positive)
11. McBurney's point tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
12. Obturator sign (Negative/Positive)
13. Psoas sign (Negative/Positive)
14. Rovsing's sign (Negative/Positive)
15. Blumberg's sign (Negative/Positive)
請告訴我20個腹痛的理學檢查項目，請以英文回答，並利用以下範例格式回覆，Rebouding pain(None/Rebounding pain +)

1. Abdominal tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
2. Abdominal distension (None/Distension +)
3. Guarding (None/Guarding +)
4. Rigidity (None/Rigidity +)
5. Palpable masses (None/Mass +)
6. Liver span (Normal/Increased/Decreased)
7. Spleen size (Normal/Enlarged)
8. Bowel sounds (Normal/Absent/Hypoactive/Hyperactive)
9. Percussion tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
10. Murphy's sign (Negative/Positive)
11. McBurney's point tenderness (None/Tenderness +)
12. Obturator sign (Negative/Positive)
13. Psoas sign (Negative/Positive)
14. Rovsing's sign (Negative/Positive)
15. Blumberg's sign (Negative/Positive)
16. Gastrointestinal bleeding (None/Positive)
17. Hematemesis (None/Positive)
18. Melena (None/Positive)
19. Rectal bleeding (None/Positive)
20. Anal fissures (None/Present)
